author: costin
msg: Cosmetic changes - added explicit imports and removed unused imports.
Moved the 2 strings from context/LocalProperties to resources.
( the idea is to provide a better handling for all resources - not for this release )
Regarding javax.servlet imports - it's important to have a clear image about the
facade<->core communication. For this release we can't support the complete
separation that would allow untrusted applications.

author: costin
msg: Removed unused files - SimpleStartup is replaced with EmbededTomcat, strings are in
resources.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:

author: costin
msg: - In Tomcat.java - made StopTomcat an independent task, that can be used outside
the simple starter.
- Also, generateConfig is a method that can be called from outside. We should make config
generation optional.
- moved string resources to tomcat.resources

author: costin
msg: - removed unused files ( DefaultServlet was replaced with StaticInterceptor, the
hack in TomcatInternalServlet is no longer needed)
- moved LocalStrings to resources - follow the same pattern as in Jasper and other
apache projects ( xml, etc).

author: alex
msg: removed reference to context.getDefaultServlet (since the method no longer exists)
